column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////It's a fun atmosphere with young crowd.  I like the specialty sangrias they have to offer
column2: especially the mango one.  The dates were unimpressive for me
column3: my friends love the goat cheese with tomato sauce so if you ilke goat cheese
column4: try it.  Grilled octopus was well seasoned
column5: rioja-braised short ribs was fall off the bone delicious. The server was very attentive.
